mapper.select: select count(*) from history where to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,6),'yyMMdd') between sysdate - 7 and sysdate
select to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as users from history group by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM')
select trunc(age/10,0) as ageGroup , count(*) as count from (select ((substr(sysdate,1,2) - substr(m_birth,1,2) + 100)) as age from member) group by trunc(age/10,0) order by ageGroup

select to_date(substr(to_char(po_time),1,5),'yy/MM') as standard, count(*) as count from point where m_id =#{m_id} and po_exact = '1' group by to_date(substr(to_char(po_time),1,5),'yy/MM') order by to_date(substr(to_char(po_time),1,5),'yy/MM')

select to_date(substr(to_char(po_time),1,5),'yy/MM') as standard, count(*) as count from point where m_id =#{m_id} and po_exact = '0' group by to_date(substr(to_char(po_time),1,5),'yy/MM') order by to_date(substr(to_char(po_time),1,5),'yy/MM')

select to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from history where m_id = #{m_id} and substr(merchant_uid,28,1) = '1' group by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM')

select to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from history where m_id = #{m_id} and substr(merchant_uid,28,1) = '0' group by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(merchant_uid,10,4),'yyMM')

select to_date(substr(to_char(re_time),1,5),'yy/MM') as standard, count(*) as count from receipt where m_id = #{m_id} and use_cash = '0' group by to_date(substr(to_char(re_time),1,5),'yy/MM') order by to_date(substr(to_char(re_time),1,5),'yy/MM')

select to_date(substr(to_char(re_time),1,5),'yy/MM') as standard, count(*) as count from receipt where m_id = #{m_id} and use_cash = '1' group by to_date(substr(to_char(re_time),1,5),'yy/MM') order by to_date(substr(to_char(re_time),1,5),'yy/MM')
select * from (select h_s_place ,count(h_s_place) as cnt, row_number() over (order by count(h_s_place) desc) as ranking from history group by h_s_place) where ranking <= 5
